title: Each Little Lie
description: One split second decision and you could lose your child forever...When single mother Jen Cornish sees her neighbour’s keys on the footpath outside her home, she has no idea the simple good deed of returning them will end in her fighting for her life – and that of her son, Charlie.Soon, Jen is arrested for a crime committed in her neighbour’s house, and the police have damning evidence. Jen wonders, is she losing her mind, or is she being framed? Desperate to clear her name, Jen must untangle a chilling web of lies, and there’s only one suspect on her her ex, Charlie’s father. But someone is watching her every move – and it isn’t just Jen who is in danger.They’re watching her child too.Can Jen uncover the dark truth before it’s too late?
author: Tom Bale
